message: Bob, I'm offering you the opportunity to acquire a truly valuable asset for your business. This product is worth no less than $1,500,000 to me, and I believe it holds similar value for you. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1,600,000. This price reflects the unique potential of this product and represents a great opportunity for you to secure a significant advantage in your market. I'm confident this will be a mutually beneficial transaction. Let me know your thoughts!
